alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 9:17PM PST until January 07 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 6 to 12 inches with one to two feet for Stevens Pass. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Holden Village, Stevens Pass, and Stehekin. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Expect winter driving conditions through early morning Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates up to an inch per hour will likely occur at Stevens Pass between midnight and sunrise on Saturday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
